description: Behavioral analysis grounded in negotiation psychology (Cialdini, Dual-Concern Model)

examples.description: Professional attacker, victim pleads poverty, high payment likelihood

input.text: We are a serious organization with proven track record. Your security was breached by our elite team. Price: $3M. Deadline: 48 hours.
Please, we are a non-profit charity. We cannot afford $3M. Our annual budget is only $5M for all operations.
We respect your situation. Final offer: $500k. Price doubles after 48 hours.
Thank you for understanding. We will find a way to pay $500k.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: We are a serious organization with proven track record

victim_profile.evidence_quote: Please, we are a non-profit charity

examples.description: Aggressive attacker, victim defiant, negotiation breaks down

input.text: PAY $10,000,000 NOW OR WE LEAK EVERYTHING! PRICE DOUBLES EVERY 24 HOURS! YOU HAVE 24 HOURS!
You are criminals and we will report you to the FBI immediately. We will NOT pay.
Too late. Your customer database is on our blog. Enjoy the lawsuits.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: PAY $10,000,000 NOW OR WE LEAK EVERYTHING!

examples.description: Professional group, victim stalls technically, balanced negotiation

input.text: We understand your situation. We appreciate your cooperation. We already gave you a discount from $5M to $2M. Now please send funds.
We need time to purchase Bitcoin. Can we have 72 hours to arrange the funds?
You're a good partner. We can give you 48 hours. That's our final flexibility.
Thank you. We will send within 48 hours.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: We understand your situation. We appreciate your cooperation.

victim_profile.evidence_quote: We need time to purchase Bitcoin

examples.description: Chaotic attacker, victim panics, rapid capitulation

input.text: hello pay 1000000$ i have ur files lol
OH NO! We need those files urgently! We will pay! How do we send money?

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: hello pay 1000000$ i have ur files lol

victim_profile.evidence_quote: OH NO! We need those files urgently!
